full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/28/2023 ATTACHMENT #7B SPOUSE, CHILD, SON OR DAUGHTER OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENT PREFERENCE: F2-6, F2-7, F2-8, F2-9, FX-6, FX-7, FX-8 If not previously submitted, 2 current color photos If not previously submitted, a Current Medical examination (Form I-693) with proof of immunization (I-693 Supplement) conducted by a civil surgeon authorized by the Immigration Service. NOTE: Applicants 2 years or older are required to have a tuberculin skin test (Mantoux) as part of the medical examination followed by a chest x-ray if reaction of 5mm or greater. Applicants under 15 years of age are routinely required to have the test as part of their medical examination. NO IMMUNIZATION IS REQUIRED IF THE APPLICATION FOR RESIDENT STATUS, FORM I-485, WAS FILED PRIOR TO 05/01/1997. Evidence of support - Applications (Form I-485) filed after 12/19/1997 must submit Form I-864 (Affidavit of Support) with the following documents: 1. Copy of sponsor's evidence of lawful permanent resident status; 2. Sonsor's current job letter with copies of 3 recent pay statements; 3. Copies of 3 recent U.S. Individual Tax returns (DO NOT SUBMIT STATE OR CORPORATE TAX RETURNS) 4. (or)Certified copies of 3 recent U.S. Individual Tax Returns from the Internal Revenue Service 5. Assets and Liabilities (See Instructions on Form I-864) Evidence of support - Applications (Form I-485) filed prior to 12/19/1997 must submit Form I-134 (Affidavit of Support) with the following documents: 1. Bank letter (See Instructions on Form I-134) 2. Sponsor's currentjob letter with copies of 3 recent pay statements 3. If self-employed (See Instructions on Form I-134) NOTE: IF AFFIDAVITS OF SUPPORT WERE PREVIOUSLY SUBMITTED, YOU MUST BRING THE SPONSOR'S CURRENT JOB LETTER WITH 3 RECENT PAY STATEMENTS, AS WELL AS, CURRENT U.S. INDIVIDUAL INCOME TAX RETURNS. SPOUSES OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENTS (ONLY). INTERVIEW MAY BE VIDEO TAPED BY THE SERVICE! Evidence showing a bonafide marital relationship since the inception of the marriage. Evidence presented must be established prior to the interview date but not within the last 60 days. YOU MUST PROVIDE ORIGINALS AND COPIES OF THESE DOCUMENTS
